Title: Jane Eyre
Writer: Charlotte Brontë (novel), Hugh Whitemore (screenplay), Franco Zeffirelli (screenplay), Josep Llurba (translation and adaptation)
Actors: Anna Paquin, Nic Knight, Nicola Howard, Sasha Graff
Plot: Jane Eyre is an orphan cast out as a young girl by her aunt, Mrs. Reed, and sent to be raised in a harsh charity school for girls. There she learns to become a teacher and eventually seeks ...
